-1.title: The Nightclub Killer
-1.plot: We follow the life of crime of mafia hitman Chen Yong Chi, from small-time gangster to Taiwan's most wanted man. Chen rose to prominence in Taichung, Taiwan in the 1990's, a boomtown that attracted organized crime. Working for the criminal underworld he brutally shot and killed 4 victims in a string of nightclub shootings. With his newfound notoriety Chen Yongchi goes on the run as Taiwan's most feared mafia hitman, unleashing a series of extortions, kidnappings and eventually gunning down a pregnant mother at the Sogo shopping mall. Avoiding capture time and again, ...
